transliteration: aśvinā gacchatam madhvaṃ somasya pītaye | yajñaṃ gacchatam nāsatyā ||
translation_english: O Aśvins, partake of the sweet Soma; attend the sacrifice, O Nāsatyas.

sanskrit_text: यदिन्द्र प्रागपि भयं नास्यं बिभेत्योजसा।
transliteration: yadindra prāg api bhayaṃ nāsyaṃ bibhety ojasā |
translation_english: When Indra goes forth, even fear itself is afraid of his power.

sanskrit_text: त्वं वज्रिण् महिना दिवः पृथिव्या अधि स्रिधः।
transliteration: tvaṃ vajrin mahinā divaḥ pṛthivyā adhi sridhaḥ |
translation_english: O wielder of the thunderbolt, by your greatness you tower over heaven and earth.

sanskrit_text: त्वं दस्यूनव धूनयः परि वृत्रं रुरोजिथ।
transliteration: tvaṃ dasyūn ava dhūnayaḥ pari vṛtraṃ rurojitha |
translation_english: You scattered the hostile tribes and crushed Vṛtra.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रः सोमस्य पीतये वज्रं बिभर्ति तेजसे।
transliteration: indraḥ somasya pītaye vajraṃ bibharti tejase |
translation_english: Indra bears the thunderbolt in glory after drinking Soma.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नृभिरवसे सचा विश्वा कर्माणि चाकृषे।
transliteration: tvaṃ nṛbhir avase sacā viśvā karmāṇi cākṛṣe |
translation_english: You, together with men, accomplish all deeds of protection.

sanskrit_text: युवं हि स्थः सुदानवो विश्वा रूपाणि बिभ्रतौ।
transliteration: yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ sudānavo viśvā rūpāṇi bibhratau |
translation_english: You two (Indra and Soma) are generous, bearing all forms.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पाहि श्रवाय्येन्द्र सोमपाः पिबा सुतम्।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pāhi śravāyyeindra somapāḥ pibā sutam |
translation_english: Protect us, O glorious Indra; drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: त्वं रयिं चोदयस्वते बृहन्तं च ददासि नः।
transliteration: tvaṃ rayiṃ codayasvate bṛhantaṃ ca dadāsi naḥ |
translation_english: You urge on wealth and grant us great riches.

sanskrit_text: युधा युद्धमभ्यागमः सवसः सहसा जयः।
transliteration: yudhā yuddham abhyāgamaḥ savasaḥ sahasā jayaḥ |
translation_english: You advance to battle and win by sheer might.

sanskrit_text: त्वं वृत्रं हन्ता भुवः पुरुत्रा वीर्यं दधः।
transliteration: tvaṃ vṛtraṃ hantā bhuvaḥ purutrā vīryaṃ dadhaḥ |
translation_english: You are the slayer of Vṛtra, spreading heroic power everywhere.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पथो अनु दर्शय विश्वानि देव वीर्याणि।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ patho anu darśaya viśvāni deva vīryāṇi |
translation_english: Show us the paths, O god, and all your heroic deeds.

sanskrit_text: त्वं वाजेषु वाजिनीवो ददासि सुष्टुतिं नः।
transliteration: tvaṃ vājeṣu vājinīvo dadāsi suṣṭutiṃ naḥ |
translation_english: Among prizes, you grant us strength and worthy praise.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नो मित्रः पिता चासि सखा विश्वस्य कर्मणः।
transliteration: tvaṃ no mitraḥ pitā cāsi sakhā viśvasya karmaṇaḥ |
translation_english: You are our friend, our father, our companion in all action.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: स नः पवस्व दुहिता वाचः सखा विश्वस्य कर्मणः।
transliteration: sa naḥ pavasva duhitā vācaḥ sakhā viśvasya karmaṇaḥ |
translation_english: Flow for us, O Soma, daughter of speech, companion of all action.

sanskrit_text: यदिन्द्र पूर्वे अपि माः ससर्जुर्विश्वा मघवन् अवसे नः।
transliteration: yadindra pūrve api māḥ sasarjur viśvā maghavan avase naḥ |
translation_english: O Indra, as in former times, may you release all your powers to help us.

sanskrit_text: त्वं हि दस्यून् अव धूनयः परि वृत्रं रुरोजिथ।
transliteration: tvaṃ hi dasyūn ava dhūnayaḥ pari vṛtraṃ rurojitha |
translation_english: You scattered the hostile tribes and crushed Vṛtra.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पावक दीदिहि सोमपाः पिब सुतम्।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pāvaka dīdihi somapāḥ piba sutam |
translation_english: Shine upon us, O purifier; drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: त्वं रयिं चोदयस्वते बृहन्तं ददासि नः।
transliteration: tvaṃ rayiṃ codayasvate bṛhantaṃ dadāsi naḥ |
translation_english: You grant great wealth to the one who urges you.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पथो अनु दर्शय विश्वानि देव वीर्याणि।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ patho anu darśaya viśvāni deva vīryāṇi |
translation_english: Show us the paths, O god, all your heroic deeds.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: त्वं हि दस्यून् अव धूनयः परि वृत्रं रुरोजिथ।
transliteration: tvaṃ hi dasyūn ava dhūnayaḥ pari vṛtraṃ rurojitha |
translation_english: You scattered the hostile tribes and crushed Vṛtra.

sanskrit_text: यदिन्द्र पूर्वे अपि माः ससर्जुर्विश्वा मघवन् अवसे नः।
transliteration: yadindra pūrve api māḥ sasarjur viśvā maghavan avase naḥ |
translation_english: As in former times, O Indra, release all your powers to help us.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पावक दीदिहि सोमपाः पिब सुतम्।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pāvaka dīdihi somapāḥ piba sutam |
translation_english: Shine upon us, O purifier; drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: त्वं रयिं चोदयस्वते बृहन्तं ददासि नः।
transliteration: tvaṃ rayiṃ codayasvate bṛhantaṃ dadāsi naḥ |
translation_english: You grant great wealth to the one who urges you.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पथो अनु दर्शय विश्वानि देव वीर्याणि।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ patho anu darśaya viśvāni deva vīryāṇi |
translation_english: Show us the paths, O god, all your heroic deeds.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: यदिन्द्र यावते महि प्रावो विश्वानि देव वीर्याणि।
transliteration: yadindra yāvate mahi prāvo viśvāni deva vīryāṇi |
translation_english: O Indra, as far as your greatness reaches, you have shown all your divine powers.

sanskrit_text: त्वं हि दस्यूनव धूनयः परि वृत्रं रुरोजिथ।
transliteration: tvaṃ hi dasyūn ava dhūnayaḥ pari vṛtraṃ rurojitha |
translation_english: You scattered the hostile tribes and crushed Vṛtra.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पावक दीदिहि सोमपाः पिब सुतम्।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pāvaka dīdihi somapāḥ piba sutam |
translation_english: Shine upon us, O purifier; drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: त्वं रयिं चोदयस्वते बृहन्तं ददासि नः।
transliteration: tvaṃ rayiṃ codayasvate bṛhantaṃ dadāsi naḥ |
translation_english: You grant great wealth to the one who urges you.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पथो अनु दर्शय विश्वानि देव वीर्याणि।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ patho anu darśaya viśvāni deva vīryāṇi |
translation_english: Show us the paths, O god, all your heroic deeds.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: प्र वोचं वाजानामिन्द्राय वृत्रहत्याय रन्धयन्।
transliteration: pra vocaṃ vājānām indrāya vṛtrahatyāya randhayan |
translation_english: I proclaim the might of Indra, the slayer of Vṛtra, who wins the prizes.

sanskrit_text: त्वं हि नः पितेव सूनवेऽविता भद्रं करिष्यसि।
transliteration: tvaṃ hi naḥ piteva sūnave avitā bhadraṃ kariṣyasi |
translation_english: You are like a father to a son; you will do good for us.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः सखा सुतसोमः कृणुष्व वीर्याणि।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ sakhā sutasomaḥ kṛṇuṣva vīryāṇi |
translation_english: Be our friend, O drinker of Soma; perform heroic deeds for us.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पथो अनु दर्शय विश्वानि देव वीर्याणि।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ patho anu darśaya viśvāni deva vīryāṇi |
translation_english: Show us the paths, O god, all your heroic deeds.

sanskrit_text: त्वं रयिं चोदयस्वते बृहन्तं ददासि नः।
transliteration: tvaṃ rayiṃ codayasvate bṛhantaṃ dadāsi naḥ |
translation_english: You grant great wealth to the one who urges you.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: मरुतो यद्वो अपां नपातो यद्वः शूरासो अश्विनावन्तः।
transliteration: maruto yad vo apāṃ napāto yad vaḥ śūrāso aśvināvantaḥ |
translation_english: O Maruts, offspring of the waters, O heroes who have horses.

sanskrit_text: यद्वो गिर्णे मरुतो दुर्मदाय यद्वो अश्वाः सुदानवः।
transliteration: yad vo girṇe maruto durmadāya yad vo aśvāḥ sudānavaḥ |
translation_english: When you are praised, O Maruts, you give joy; your horses are generous.

sanskrit_text: यद्वो रुद्रा मरुतो धृष्टवाजसो यद्वो रथाः सुदानवः।
transliteration: yad vo rudrā maruto dhṛṣṭavājāso yad vo rathāḥ sudānavaḥ |
translation_english: O Maruts, sons of Rudra, bold in might; your chariots are generous.

sanskrit_text: यद्वो अर्भाः मरुतो घोरवाजसो यद्वो वृषा रथाः।
transliteration: yad vo arbhāḥ maruto ghoravājāso yad vo vṛṣā rathāḥ |
translation_english: O youthful Maruts, fierce in strength; your chariots are mighty.

sanskrit_text: यद्वो हुवे मरुतो यज्ञियासो यद्वो धियं सुदानवः।
transliteration: yad vo huve maruto yajñiyāso yad vo dhiyaṃ sudānavaḥ |
translation_english: When I call you, O Maruts, worthy of sacrifice, you grant inspired thought.

sanskrit_text: यदिन्द्र पूर्वे अपि माः ससर्जुर्विश्वा मघवन् अवसे नः।
transliteration: yadindra pūrve api māḥ sasarjur viśvā maghavan avase naḥ |
translation_english: As in former times, O Indra, release all your powers to help us.

sanskrit_text: त्वं हि दस्यूनव धूनयः परि वृत्रं रुरोजिथ।
transliteration: tvaṃ hi dasyūn ava dhūnayaḥ pari vṛtraṃ rurojitha |
translation_english: You scattered the hostile tribes and crushed Vṛtra.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पावक दीदिहि सोमपाः पिब सुतम्।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pāvaka dīdihi somapāḥ piba sutam |
translation_english: Shine upon us, O purifier; drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: त्वं रयिं चोदयस्वते बृहन्तं ददासि नः।
transliteration: tvaṃ rayiṃ codayasvate bṛhantaṃ dadāsi naḥ |
translation_english: You grant great wealth to the one who urges you.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पथो अनु दर्शय विश्वानि देव वीर्याणि।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ patho anu darśaya viśvāni deva vīryāṇi |
translation_english: Show us the paths, O god, all your heroic deeds.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्मूर्धा दिवः ककुत्पतिः पृथिव्या अयम् । अपां रेतांसि जिन्वति ॥
transliteration: agnir mūrdhā divaḥ kakutpatiḥ pṛthivyā ayam | apāṃ retāṃsi jinvati ||
translation_english: Agni is the head of heaven, the lord of the earth; he invigorates the waters’ seed.

sanskrit_text: तमीशानं जगतः स्थातारं विश्ववेदसम् । अग्निं दूतं वृणीमहे ॥
transliteration: tam īśānaṃ jagataḥ sthātāraṃ viśvavedasam | agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
translation_english: We choose Agni as messenger, the ruler and supporter of the world, knower of all.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्हि देवाँ अवसे स नो यज्ञेषु वक्षति । स नो देवानिहावहत् ॥
transliteration: agnir hi devān avase sa no yajñeṣu vakṣati | sa no devān ihāvahat ||
translation_english: Agni brings the gods for our aid in the sacrifices; he brings the gods here.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्नो देवता यज्याः पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः । स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु ॥
transliteration: agnir no devatā yajyāḥ purohito viśvavedāḥ | sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu ||
translation_english: Agni, our adorable god and all-knowing priest, may he rightly guide our sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: यदङ्ग दाशुषे त्वमग्ने भद्रं करिष्यसि । तवेत्तत्सत्यमङ्गिरः ॥
transliteration: yad aṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi | tavet tat satyam aṅgiraḥ ||
translation_english: Whatever good you do for the giver, O Agni, that is truly yours, O Angiras.

sanskrit_text: उप त्वाग्ने दिवेदिवे दोषावस्तर्धिया वयम् । नमो भरन्त एमसि ॥
transliteration: upa tvāgne dive-dive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam | namo bharanta emasi ||
translation_english: To you, O Agni, day by day, at dusk and dawn, we come with reverence.

sanskrit_text: अग्ने शुक्रेण शोचिषा विश्वाभिर्देवहूतिभिः । इमं स्तोमं जुषस्व नः ॥
transliteration: agne śukreṇa śociṣā viśvābhir devahūtibhiḥ | imaṃ stomaṃ juṣasva naḥ ||
translation_english: O Agni, with your bright flame and all divine invocations, accept this hymn of ours.

sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो वरुणो मा महान्तमदितिः सिन्धुम् । रक्षन्त्वग्ने शवसा ॥
transliteration: sa no mitro varuṇo mā mahāntam aditiḥ sindhum | rakṣantv agne śavasā ||
translation_english: May Mitra, Varuṇa, and great Aditi protect us by your power, O Agni.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पाहि श्रवाय्याग्ने देवेषु मानुषेषु च ।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pāhi śravāyyāgne deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca |
translation_english: Protect us, O glorious Agni, among gods and among men.

sanskrit_text: यदग्ने यानि ते क्रतूनि तानि विद्मसि । तेषु नो अधि चाकन ॥
transliteration: yad agne yāni te kratūni tāni vidmasi | teṣu no adhi cākana ||
translation_english: We know the wise powers that are yours, O Agni; delight in them for our sake.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं हुवे पुरोहितं यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजम् । होतारं रत्नधातमम् ॥
transliteration: agniṃ huve purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam | hotāraṃ ratnadhātamam ||
translation_english: I call upon Agni, the household priest, divine minister of the sacrifice, the best giver of treasures.

sanskrit_text: स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु देवेषु च मनुष्येषु ।
transliteration: sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu deveṣu ca manuṣyeṣu |
translation_english: May he rightly guide our sacrifice among gods and among men.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु स्वस्ति नो मित्रावरुणौ । स्वस्ति नो अदितिः करोतु ॥
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu svasti no mitrāvaruṇau | svasti no aditiḥ karotu ||
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being; may Mitra and Varuṇa grant us well-being; may Aditi grant us well-being.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राय नूनं अर्चता सुतस्य सोमस्य पीतये ।
transliteration: indrāya nūnaṃ arcatā sutasya somasya pītaye |
translation_english: Praise Indra now, that he may drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: स घा वीरः सुतावतोऽस्मानवति विश्वचर्षणिः ।
transliteration: sa ghā vīraḥ sutāvato asmān avati viśvacarṣaṇiḥ |
translation_english: That hero, lord of all peoples, protects us who offer Soma.

sanskrit_text: यस्य ते महिना महि वृषभस्येव ते रथः ।
transliteration: yasya te mahinā mahi vṛṣabhasyeva te rathaḥ |
translation_english: By whose greatness your might is vast, like the chariot of a powerful bull.

sanskrit_text: स नः सखा शिवो भव सूनवे पितेव नो भव ।
transliteration: sa naḥ sakhā śivo bhava sūnave piteva no bhava |
translation_english: Be our friendly companion, gracious to us like a father to his son.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये ।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call upon Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: स नो वृषा जनानां विश्वेषां दुरिता नशत् ।
transliteration: sa no vṛṣā janānāṃ viśveṣāṃ duritā naśat |
translation_english: May that strong one remove all misfortunes from all people.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं वर्धन्तो अप्तुरः कृण्वन्तो विश्वमार्यम् ।
transliteration: indraṃ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvanto viśvam āryam |
translation_english: Strengthening Indra, the active ones make all things noble.

sanskrit_text: स घा वीरः सुतावतोऽस्मानवति विश्वचर्षणिः ।
transliteration: sa ghā vīraḥ sutāvato asmān avati viśvacarṣaṇiḥ |
translation_english: That hero, lord of all peoples, protects us who offer Soma.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रः सोमस्य पीतये वज्रं बिभर्ति तेजसे ।
transliteration: indraḥ somasya pītaye vajraṃ bibharti tejase |
translation_english: Indra bears the thunderbolt in glory after drinking Soma.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः सखा शिवो भव सूनवे पितेव नो भव ।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ sakhā śivo bhava sūnave piteva no bhava |
translation_english: Be our friendly companion, gracious like a father to his son.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये ।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: स नो वृषा जनानां विश्वेषां दुरिता नशत् ।
transliteration: sa no vṛṣā janānāṃ viśveṣāṃ duritā naśat |
translation_english: May that mighty one remove all misfortunes from all people.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राय नूनं अर्चता सुतस्य सोमस्य पीतये ।
transliteration: indrāya nūnaṃ arcatā sutasya somasya pītaye |
translation_english: Praise Indra now, that he may drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: स घा वीरः सुतावतोऽस्मानवति विश्वचर्षणिः ।
transliteration: sa ghā vīraḥ sutāvato asmān avati viśvacarṣaṇiḥ |
translation_english: That hero, lord of all peoples, protects us who offer Soma.

sanskrit_text: यस्य ते महिना महि वृषभस्येव ते रथः ।
transliteration: yasya te mahinā mahi vṛṣabhasyeva te rathaḥ |
translation_english: By whose greatness your might is vast, like the chariot of a powerful bull.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः सखा शिवो भव सूनवे पितेव नो भव ।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ sakhā śivo bhava sūnave piteva no bhava |
translation_english: Be our friendly companion, gracious like a father to his son.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये ।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: स नो वृषा जनानां विश्वेषां दुरिता नशत् ।
transliteration: sa no vṛṣā janānāṃ viśveṣāṃ duritā naśat |
translation_english: May that mighty one remove all misfortunes from all people.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं वर्धन्तो अप्तुरः कृण्वन्तो विश्वमार्यम् ।
transliteration: indraṃ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvanto viśvam āryam |
translation_english: Strengthening Indra, the active worshippers make all things noble.

sanskrit_text: शूरो वा शूरमावृतो वज्रिणा वृत्रमवधीत् ।
transliteration: śūro vā śūram āvṛto vajriṇā vṛtram avadhīt |
translation_english: The hero, facing the hero, slew Vṛtra with the thunderbolt.

sanskrit_text: त्वं हि दस्यूनव धूनयः परि वृत्रं रुरोजिथ ।
transliteration: tvaṃ hi dasyūn ava dhūnayaḥ pari vṛtraṃ rurojitha |
translation_english: You scattered the hostile tribes and crushed Vṛtra.

sanskrit_text: अहन्नहिं पर्वते शिश्रियाणं त्वष्टास्मै वज्रं स्वर्यम् ततक्ष ।
transliteration: ahann ahiṃ parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭā asmai vajraṃ svaryaṃ tatakṣa |
translation_english: You struck down the serpent lying on the mountain; Tvaṣṭṛ fashioned the radiant thunderbolt for you.

sanskrit_text: येन द्यौरुग्रा पृथिवी च दृळ्हा येन स्वः स्तभितं येन नाकः ।
transliteration: yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḷhā yena svaḥ stabhitaṃ yena nākaḥ |
translation_english: By whom the fierce heaven and firm earth were fixed, by whom the sky and the firmament were upheld.

sanskrit_text: स नः सखा शिवो भव सूनवे पितेव नो भव ।
transliteration: sa naḥ sakhā śivo bhava sūnave piteva no bhava |
translation_english: Be our gracious friend, like a father to his son.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये ।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call upon Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: स नो विश्वानि दुरिता नशत् वज्री वृषा जनानाम् ।
transliteration: sa no viśvāni duritā naśat vajrī vṛṣā janānām |
translation_english: May the thunderbolt-bearer, the strong one, drive away all our misfortunes.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नो इन्द्र ऋते यज्ञं विश्वतः परिभूरसि ।
transliteration: tvaṃ no indra ṛte yajñaṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: Without you, O Indra, no sacrifice succeeds; you encompass it on every side.

sanskrit_text: आ वो राजानमध्वराणां मरुतः शृणुत हवम् ।
transliteration: ā vo rājānam adhvarāṇāṃ marutaḥ śṛṇuta havam |
translation_english: O Maruts, rulers of the sacrifices, hear our call.

sanskrit_text: येषां न रथ्या पृथिवी न द्यौर्येषां रजांसि मरुतः।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ na rathyā pṛthivī na dyaur yeṣāṃ rajāṃsi marutaḥ |
translation_english: For whom neither earth nor heaven is too vast, O Maruts.

sanskrit_text: येषां शर्धो न मर्यं न स्तोमं मरुतो नयन्ति।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ śardho na maryaṃ na stomaṃ maruto nayanti |
translation_english: Whose host no mortal restrains, whose praise none can hinder.

sanskrit_text: अर्चन्ति मरुतः सुभ्रा ऋतस्य पन्थामन्विताः।
transliteration: arcanti marutaḥ subhrā ṛtasya panthām anvitāḥ |
translation_english: The shining Maruts sing, following the path of cosmic order.

sanskrit_text: रथेषु वो मरुतो धूनयः शुचयः।
transliteration: ratheṣu vo maruto dhūnayaḥ śucayaḥ |
translation_english: On your chariots, O Maruts, gleam the pure spears.

sanskrit_text: न वः शर्धो न मर्यं विव्यक्तं नास्मानृणोत।
transliteration: na vaḥ śardho na maryaṃ vivyaktaṃ nāsmān ṛṇota |
translation_english: No hostile force can overcome your troop, nor harm us.

sanskrit_text: मरुतो यद्वः पृश्निमातरः सुदानवः।
transliteration: maruto yad vaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ sudānavaḥ |
translation_english: O generous Maruts, sons of Pṛśni.

sanskrit_text: येषां वृषा रथाः सुदानवः।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ vṛṣā rathāḥ sudānavaḥ |
translation_english: Whose mighty chariots grant abundance.

sanskrit_text: येषां गिर्देवेषु प्रथमा।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ gir deveṣu prathamā |
translation_english: Whose praise is foremost among the gods.

sanskrit_text: ते नो मरुतः पान्तु विश्वतः।
transliteration: te no marutaḥ pāntu viśvataḥ |
translation_english: May those Maruts protect us on every side.

sanskrit_text: मरुतो यज्ञमाशिषम्।
transliteration: maruto yajñam āśiṣam |
translation_english: O Maruts, accept the blessing of the sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: ते नो वृष्टीः सुवीर्याः।
transliteration: te no vṛṣṭīḥ suvīryāḥ |
translation_english: Grant us rains and heroic strength.

sanskrit_text: येषां धूनयः शुचयः।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ dhūnayaḥ śucayaḥ |
translation_english: Whose spears are bright and pure.

sanskrit_text: मरुतः शृणुतं हवम्।
transliteration: marutaḥ śṛṇutaṃ havam |
translation_english: O Maruts, hear our invocation.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो मरुतो दधातन।
transliteration: svasti no maruto dadhātana |
translation_english: Bestow well-being upon us, O Maruts.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं हुवे पुरोहितं यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजम् । होतारं रत्नधातमम् ॥
transliteration: agniṃ huve purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam | hotāraṃ ratnadhātamam ||
translation_english: I invoke Agni, the household priest, the divine minister of the sacrifice, the invoker who bestows treasures.

sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो वरुणो मा महान्तमदितिः सिन्धुम् । रक्षन्त्वग्ने शवसा ॥
transliteration: sa no mitro varuṇo mā mahāntam aditiḥ sindhum | rakṣantv agne śavasā ||
translation_english: May Mitra, Varuṇa, great Aditi, and the ocean protect us by your power, O Agni.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पाहि श्रवाय्याग्ने देवेषु मानुषेषु च ।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pāhi śravāyyāgne deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca |
translation_english: Protect us, O glorious Agni, among gods and among men.

sanskrit_text: यदग्ने यानि ते क्रतूनि तानि विद्मसि । तेषु नो अधि चाकन ॥
transliteration: yad agne yāni te kratūni tāni vidmasi | teṣu no adhi cākana ||
translation_english: We know the wise powers that are yours, O Agni; delight in them for our sake.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्नो देवता यज्याः पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः । स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु ॥
transliteration: agnir no devatā yajyāḥ purohito viśvavedāḥ | sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu ||
translation_english: Agni, our adorable god and all-knowing priest, may he rightly guide our sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु स्वस्ति नो मित्रावरुणौ । स्वस्ति नो अदितिः करोतु ॥
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu svasti no mitrāvaruṇau | svasti no aditiḥ karotu ||
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being; may Mitra and Varuṇa grant us well-being; may Aditi grant us well-being.

sanskrit_text: आ यात मरुतो दिवो अन्तान्पृथिव्या उत।
transliteration: ā yāta maruto divo antān pṛthivyā uta |
translation_english: Come, O Maruts, from the ends of heaven and from the earth.

sanskrit_text: येषां शर्धो न मर्यं न स्तोमं निहन्यते।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ śardho na maryaṃ na stomaṃ nihanyate |
translation_english: Whose troop no mortal restrains, whose praise none can destroy.

sanskrit_text: तेषां रथेषु रोचते वृषा वाजिनिवो बलम्।
transliteration: teṣāṃ ratheṣu rocate vṛṣā vājinivo balam |
translation_english: On their chariots shines strength like that of a powerful bull.

sanskrit_text: येषां धूनयो न विक्षिपे शुचयः पतयन्ति।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ dhūnayo na vikṣipe śucayaḥ patayanti |
translation_english: Whose bright spears fly without being deflected.

sanskrit_text: मरुतो हि प्रथमा देवेषु गीष्पतिः।
transliteration: maruto hi prathamā deveṣu gīṣpatiḥ |
translation_english: The Maruts are foremost among the gods in praise.

sanskrit_text: येषां वृषा रथाः सुदानवः।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ vṛṣā rathāḥ sudānavaḥ |
translation_english: Whose mighty chariots are generous givers.

sanskrit_text: ते नो मरुतः पान्तु विश्वतः।
transliteration: te no marutaḥ pāntu viśvataḥ |
translation_english: May those Maruts protect us on every side.

sanskrit_text: मरुतो यज्ञमाशिषम्।
transliteration: maruto yajñam āśiṣam |
translation_english: O Maruts, accept the blessing of the sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: ते नो वृष्टीः सुवीर्याः।
transliteration: te no vṛṣṭīḥ suvīryāḥ |
translation_english: Grant us rains and heroic strength.

sanskrit_text: येषां पृश्निमातरः शूराः।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ pṛśnimātaraḥ śūrāḥ |
translation_english: Whose mothers are Pṛśni, whose nature is heroic.

sanskrit_text: न वः शर्धो न मर्यं विव्यक्तम्।
transliteration: na vaḥ śardho na maryaṃ vivyaktam |
translation_english: No force can clearly overcome your host.

sanskrit_text: मरुतः शृणुतं हवम्।
transliteration: marutaḥ śṛṇutaṃ havam |
translation_english: O Maruts, hear our invocation.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो मरुतो दधातन।
transliteration: svasti no maruto dadhātana |
translation_english: Bestow well-being upon us, O Maruts.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होतारमुवाच यज्ञस्य पूरे ऋतवः । त्वां हविषा दधाम्यहम् ॥
transliteration: agnir hotāram uvāca yajñasya pūre ṛtavaḥ | tvāṃ haviṣā dadhāmy aham ||
translation_english: Agni, the priest, said: “Before the sacrifice, O ṛtava (upholder of order), I place you with offerings.”

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्हि समिधा धात्रा विश्वान्नो दधातु सुम्ना ।
transliteration: agnir hi samidhā dhātrā viśvānn o dadhātu sumnā |
translation_english: Agni, the giver of fuel, may he grant us all things with kindly favor.

sanskrit_text: तया नः सुम्ना भवतु मित्रवरुणौ ।
transliteration: tayā naḥ sumnā bhavatu mitravaruṇau |
translation_english: By that kindly (force), may Mitra and Varuṇa be gracious to us.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्जातवेदसो मित्रवरुणस्य शरणं सदा भवति ।
transliteration: agnir jātavedaso mitravaruṇasya śaraṇaṃ sadā bhavati |
translation_english: Agni, knower of births, is ever the refuge of Mitra and Varuṇa.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्हि नः पथिकृत्तमो देवेषु मानुषेषु च ॥
transliteration: agnir hi naḥ pathikṛttamo deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca ||
translation_english: Agni is the best guide for us among gods and among humans.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्हविष्मान् रयिमध्वरे विशवन्तमध्वराणाम् । स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु ॥
transliteration: agnir haviṣmān rayim adhvare viśvantam adhvarāṇām | sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu ||
translation_english: O Agni, rich in offerings, rich in praise, all-knowing priest of sacrifices, may he rightly guide our sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं हुवे जातवेदसं देवां देवेषु यज्ञियम् ।
transliteration: agniṃ huve jātavedasaṃ devāṃ deveṣu yajñiyam |
translation_english: I invoke Agni, knower of all births, the god worthy of worship among the gods.

sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो वरुणो मा महान्तमदितिः सिन्धुम् । रक्षन्त्वग्ने शवसा ॥
transliteration: sa no mitro varuṇo mā mahāntam aditiḥ sindhum | rakṣantv agne śavasā ||
translation_english: May Mitra, Varuṇa, great Aditi, and the ocean protect us by your power, O Agni.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पाहि श्रवाय्याग्ने देवेषु मानुषेषु च ।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pāhi śravāyyāgne deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca |
translation_english: Protect us, O glorious Agni, among gods and among men.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्नो देवता यज्याः पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः ।
transliteration: agnir no devatā yajyāḥ purohito viśvavedāḥ |
translation_english: Agni, our adorable god and all-knowing priest.

sanskrit_text: स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु विश्वतः परिभूरसि ।
transliteration: sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May he rightly guide our sacrifice, encompassing it on every side.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु स्वस्ति नो मित्रावरुणौ । स्वस्ति नो अदितिः करोतु ॥
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu svasti no mitrāvaruṇau | svasti no aditiḥ karotu ||
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being; may Mitra and Varuṇa grant us well-being; may Aditi grant us well-being.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं हुवे पुरोहितं यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजम् । होतारं रत्नधातमम् ॥
transliteration: agniṃ huve purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam | hotāraṃ ratnadhātamam ||
translation_english: I invoke Agni, the household priest, the divine officiant of the sacrifice, the invoker who bestows treasures.

sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो वरुणो मा महान्तमदितिः सिन्धुम् । रक्षन्त्वग्ने शवसा ॥
transliteration: sa no mitro varuṇo mā mahāntam aditiḥ sindhum | rakṣantv agne śavasā ||
translation_english: May Mitra, Varuṇa, great Aditi, and the ocean protect us by your power, O Agni.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पाहि श्रवाय्याग्ने देवेषु मानुषेषु च ।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pāhi śravāyyāgne deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca |
translation_english: Protect us, O glorious Agni, among gods and among humans.

sanskrit_text: यदग्ने यानि ते क्रतूनि तानि विद्मसि । तेषु नो अधि चाकन ॥
transliteration: yad agne yāni te kratūni tāni vidmasi | teṣu no adhi cākana ||
translation_english: We know the wise powers that are yours, O Agni; delight in them for our sake.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्नो देवता यज्याः पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः । स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु ॥
transliteration: agnir no devatā yajyāḥ purohito viśvavedāḥ | sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu ||
translation_english: Agni, our adorable god and all-knowing priest, may he rightly guide our sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु स्वस्ति नो मित्रावरुणौ । स्वस्ति नो अदितिः करोतु ॥
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu svasti no mitrāvaruṇau | svasti no aditiḥ karotu ||
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being; may Mitra and Varuṇa grant us well-being; may Aditi grant us well-being.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं नरो दीधितिभिर्गिरोभिः समिद्धमाहुः स हविर्दधाति ।
transliteration: agniṃ naro dīdhitibhir girobhir samiddham āhuḥ sa havir dadhāti |
translation_english: Men, with shining thoughts and hymns, kindle Agni; he places the oblation.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्हि देवाँ अवसे स नो यज्ञेषु वक्षति ।
transliteration: agnir hi devān avase sa no yajñeṣu vakṣati |
translation_english: Agni indeed brings the gods for our aid; he bears them to our sacrifices.

sanskrit_text: स नो देवाँ इहावहत् जातवेदाः पुरोहितः ।
transliteration: sa no devān ihāvahat jātavedāḥ purohitaḥ |
translation_english: May Jātavedas, the household priest, bring the gods here to us.

sanskrit_text: यदग्ने यानि ते क्रतूनि तानि विद्मसि ।
transliteration: yad agne yāni te kratūni tāni vidmasi |
translation_english: Whatever wise powers are yours, O Agni, we know them.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्नो देवता यज्याः स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु ।
transliteration: agnir no devatā yajyāḥ sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu |
translation_english: Agni, our adorable god, may he rightly guide our sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु विश्वतः परिभूरसि ।
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being, encompassing us on every side.

sanskrit_text: उप प्र जिन्वन्ति गिरयः सन्ना अग्निं यमं जनाः ।
transliteration: upa pra jinvanti girayaḥ sannā agniṃ yamaṃ janāḥ |
translation_english: Men kindle Agni with hymns, bringing him forth like Yama, firmly established.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं नरः पूर्वे ऋषयो विध्यन्ति धीतिभिः ।
transliteration: agniṃ naraḥ pūrve ṛṣayo vidhyanti dhītibhiḥ |
translation_english: Men and the ancient seers set Agni in place with inspired thought.

sanskrit_text: स देवेषु मानुषेषु च पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः ।
transliteration: sa deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca purohito viśvavedāḥ |
translation_english: He is the priest among gods and among men, the knower of all.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्दूतः कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः ।
transliteration: agnir dūtaḥ kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
translation_english: Agni is the messenger, wise in counsel, truthful, and of radiant fame.

sanskrit_text: स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु देवेषु च मनुष्येषु ।
transliteration: sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu deveṣu ca manuṣyeṣu |
translation_english: May he rightly guide our sacrifice among gods and among humans.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु विश्वतः परिभूरसि ।
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being, encompassing us on every side.

sanskrit_text: उद् उषा उषसो जातवेदसो देवस्य यामः ।
transliteration: ud uṣā uṣaso jātavedaso devasya yāmaḥ |
translation_english: At the rising of Dawn, the course of Agni, knower of births, the god, is revealed.

sanskrit_text: तमिद्धि पूर्वे ऋषयो विध्यन्तो धीतिभिः ।
transliteration: tam id dhi pūrve ṛṣayo vidhyanto dhītibhiḥ |
translation_english: Him indeed the ancient seers established with inspired thought.

sanskrit_text: स देवेषु मानुषेषु च पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः ।
transliteration: sa deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca purohito viśvavedāḥ |
translation_english: He is priest among gods and among men, the knower of all.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्दूतः कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः ।
transliteration: agnir dūtaḥ kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
translation_english: Agni is the messenger, wise in counsel, truthful, and of radiant fame.

sanskrit_text: स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु देवेषु च मनुष्येषु ।
transliteration: sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu deveṣu ca manuṣyeṣu |
translation_english: May he rightly guide our sacrifice among gods and among humans.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु विश्वतः परिभूरसि ।
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being, encompassing us on every side.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं नरो दीधितिभिर्गिरोभिः समिद्धमाहुः स हविर्दधाति ।
transliteration: agniṃ naro dīdhitibhir girobhir samiddham āhuḥ sa havir dadhāti |
translation_english: Men, with shining thoughts and hymns, kindle Agni; he places the oblation.

sanskrit_text: स नो देवाँ अवसे वहाति जातवेदाः पुरोहितः ।
transliteration: sa no devān avase vahāti jātavedāḥ purohitaḥ |
translation_english: Jātavedas, the household priest, brings the gods to us for our aid.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्दूतः कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः ।
transliteration: agnir dūtaḥ kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
translation_english: Agni is the messenger, wise in counsel, truthful, and of radiant fame.

sanskrit_text: स देवेषु मानुषेषु च पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः ।
transliteration: sa deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca purohito viśvavedāḥ |
translation_english: He is priest among gods and among humans, the knower of all.

sanskrit_text: यदग्ने यानि ते क्रतूनि तानि विद्मसि ।
transliteration: yad agne yāni te kratūni tāni vidmasi |
translation_english: Whatever wise powers are yours, O Agni, we know them.

sanskrit_text: स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु देवेषु च मनुष्येषु ।
transliteration: sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu deveṣu ca manuṣyeṣu |
translation_english: May he rightly guide our sacrifice among gods and among humans.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु विश्वतः परिभूरसि ।
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being, encompassing us on every side.

sanskrit_text: उदग्ने तिष्ठ दिवि शोचिषा यामन्ना सूर्यस्य दुहितेव भासि ।
transliteration: ud agne tiṣṭha divi śociṣā yāmannā sūryasya duhiteva bhāsi |
translation_english: Rise up, O Agni, and stand in heaven with your flame; you shine like the daughter of the Sun.

sanskrit_text: तं त्वा देवा अमृताय दधुः पुरुत्रा यज्ञेषु मानुषेषु ।
transliteration: taṃ tvā devā amṛtāya dadhuḥ purutrā yajñeṣu mānuṣeṣu |
translation_english: The gods established you for immortality, in many sacrifices among men.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पावक दीदिहि सोमपाः पिब सुतम् ।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ pāvaka dīdihi somapāḥ piba sutam |
translation_english: Shine upon us, O purifier; drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्हि देवाँ अवसे स नो यज्ञेषु वक्षति ।
transliteration: agnir hi devān avase sa no yajñeṣu vakṣati |
translation_english: Agni brings the gods to our sacrifices for our aid.

sanskrit_text: स देवेषु मानुषेषु च पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः ।
transliteration: sa deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca purohito viśvavedāḥ |
translation_english: He is priest among gods and among men, the knower of all.

sanskrit_text: स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु विश्वतः परिभूरसि ।
transliteration: sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May he rightly guide our sacrifice, encompassing it on every side.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु स्वस्ति नो मित्रावरुणौ ।
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu svasti no mitrāvaruṇau |
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being; may Mitra and Varuṇa grant us well-being.

sanskrit_text: सोमं पिबेन्द्र वृषभा सुते मध्वः ।
transliteration: somaṃ pibendra vṛṣabhā sute madhvaḥ |
translation_english: Drink the Soma, O Indra the mighty, pressed and sweet.

sanskrit_text: सोमं पवस्व धारया मधोरभि ।
transliteration: somaṃ pavasva dhārayā madhor abhi |
translation_english: Flow forth, O Soma, in streams of sweetness.

sanskrit_text: सोमं देवाः पिबन्ति विश्वदेवाः ।
transliteration: somaṃ devāḥ pibanti viśvadevāḥ |
translation_english: The gods, all the gods, drink the Soma.

sanskrit_text: सोमः पवित्रे अधि रोचते शुभः ।
transliteration: somaḥ pavitre adhi rocate śubhaḥ |
translation_english: Soma shines brightly upon the filter.

sanskrit_text: सोमः पवमानो जनयत् स्वस्ति ।
transliteration: somaḥ pavamāno janayat svasti |
translation_english: Purifying Soma brings forth well-being.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं नरो दीधितिभिर्गिरोभिः समिद्धमाहुः स हविर्दधाति ।
transliteration: agniṃ naro dīdhitibhir girobhir samiddham āhuḥ sa havir dadhāti |
translation_english: Men kindle Agni with shining thoughts and hymns; he places the oblation.

sanskrit_text: स नो देवाँ अवसे वहाति जातवेदाः पुरोहितः ।
transliteration: sa no devān avase vahāti jātavedāḥ purohitaḥ |
translation_english: Jātavedas, the household priest, brings the gods to us for our aid.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्दूतः कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः ।
transliteration: agnir dūtaḥ kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
translation_english: Agni is the messenger, wise in counsel, truthful, and of radiant fame.

sanskrit_text: स देवेषु मानुषेषु च पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः ।
transliteration: sa deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca purohito viśvavedāḥ |
translation_english: He is priest among gods and among humans, the knower of all.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु विश्वतः परिभूरसि ।
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being, encompassing us on every side.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं हुवे पुरोहितं यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजम् ।
transliteration: agniṃ huve purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam |
translation_english: I invoke Agni, the household priest, the divine officiant of the sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: होतारं रत्नधातमम् ।
transliteration: hotāraṃ ratnadhātamam |
translation_english: The invoker who bestows the greatest treasure.

sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिरीड्यो नूतनैरुत ।
transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta |
translation_english: Agni, worthy of praise by ancient seers and by the modern ones.

sanskrit_text: स देवाँ एह वक्षति ।
transliteration: sa devān eha vakṣati |
translation_english: He shall bring the gods here.

sanskrit_text: अग्निना रयिमश्नवत् पोषमेव दिवे दिवे ।
transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva dive-dive |
translation_english: Through Agni one gains wealth and nourishment day by day.

sanskrit_text: यशसं वीरवत्तमम् ।
transliteration: yaśasaṃ vīravattamam |
translation_english: Glorious and rich in heroic sons.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राय नूनं अर्चता सुतस्य सोमस्य पीतये ।
transliteration: indrāya nūnaṃ arcatā sutasya somasya pītaye |
translation_english: Praise Indra now, that he may drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: स घा वीरः सुतावतोऽस्मानवति विश्वचर्षणिः ।
transliteration: sa ghā vīraḥ sutāvato asmān avati viśvacarṣaṇiḥ |
translation_english: That hero, lord of all peoples, protects us who offer Soma.

sanskrit_text: यस्य ते महिना महि वृषभस्येव ते रथः ।
transliteration: yasya te mahinā mahi vṛṣabhasyeva te rathaḥ |
translation_english: By whose greatness your might is vast, like the chariot of a powerful bull.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः सखा शिवो भव सूनवे पितेव नो भव ।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ sakhā śivo bhava sūnave piteva no bhava |
translation_english: Be our friendly companion, gracious like a father to his son.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नृभिरवसे हवामहे सुतस्य पीतये ।
transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: स नो वृषा जनानां विश्वेषां दुरिता नशत् ।
transliteration: sa no vṛṣā janānāṃ viśveṣāṃ duritā naśat |
translation_english: May that mighty one remove all misfortunes from all people.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रः सोमस्य पीतये वज्रं बिभर्ति तेजसे ।
transliteration: indraḥ somasya pītaye vajraṃ bibharti tejase |
translation_english: Indra bears the thunderbolt in glory after drinking Soma.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः पथो अनु दर्शय विश्वानि देव वीर्याणि ।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ patho anu darśaya viśvāni deva vīryāṇi |
translation_english: Show us the paths, O god, all your heroic deeds.

sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रः पिता चासि सखा विश्वस्य कर्मणः ।
transliteration: sa no mitraḥ pitā cāsi sakhā viśvasya karmaṇaḥ |
translation_english: You are our friend and father, companion in all action.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं नरो दीधितिभिर्गिरोभिः समिद्धमाहुः स हविर्दधाति ।
transliteration: agniṃ naro dīdhitibhir girobhir samiddham āhuḥ sa havir dadhāti |

transliteration: agnir dūtaḥ kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |

transliteration: indraṃ nṛbhir avase havāmahe sutasya pītaye |
translation_english: We call Indra with men for help, to drink the pressed Soma.

sanskrit_text: प्रणूनं पूर्णवन्धुरः स्तुतः याहि वषाणु योजन् इति इन्द्र।
transliteration: pra nūnaṃ pūrṇa-vandhuraḥ stutaḥ yāhi vaṣāṇu yojan iti indra |
translation_english: Let us laud you with complete devotion, O Indra; now, having yoked the chariot-seat, go forth according to your wishes.

sanskrit_text: यत्र तव तेजसा बलं वाजिनामप्सु रोजमुद्यते।
transliteration: yatra tava tejasa balaṃ vājinām apsu rojam udyate |
translation_english: Where your strength with brilliant energy increases among the swift-moving horses in the waters.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्र वशेभिः हि योद्धुं वेध॑माणः पिबेहि सोमम्।
transliteration: indra vaśebhiḥ hi yoddhuṃ vedhamāṇaḥ pibehi somam |
translation_english: O Indra, while we prepare for battle, drink the Soma with control and force.

sanskrit_text: ते त्वया पूतपाशवो धनवो दधुर विश्वत॑सि।
transliteration: te tvayā pūtapāśavo dhanavo dadhur viśvatas i |
translation_english: With you as the purifier, those bound by debts have upheld wealth on all sides.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राय दधिमहि वृषभं वाजिनामेव ते रथः।
transliteration: indrāya dadhimahi vṛṣabhaṃ vājinameva te rathaḥ |
translation_english: For Indra we prepare the strong bull-like chariot for your horses.

sanskrit_text: सोमं पिब प्र च करो वाजिनो युधि धारय।
transliteration: somaṃ piba pra ca karo vājinō yudhi dhāraya |
translation_english: Drink the Soma, and urge on the horses; uphold in battle.

sanskrit_text: अस्माकमिन्द्र संस्तुतिर्दुहिता दिवो अर्हति।
transliteration: asmākam indra saṃstutir duhitā divo arhati |
translation_english: Our praise, O Indra, worthy as a daughter of heaven, is offered to you.

sanskrit_text: त्वं हि नः पितेव सूनवेऽविता भद्रं करिष्यसि।
transliteration: tvaṃ hi naḥ piteva sūnave avitā bhadraṃ kariṣyasi |
translation_english: You are indeed like a father to a son; you will do good for us as our protector.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्र युध्यस्व परि वृत्रं जग्रभन्परि दस्यून्।
transliteration: indra yudhyasva pari vṛtraṃ jagrabhan pari dasyūn |
translation_english: Fight, O Indra; seize Vṛtra and overcome the hostile foes.

sanskrit_text: स नो वाजेषु वाजिनीवो रथेषु शूरः पवस्व।
transliteration: sa no vājeṣu vājinīvo ratheṣu śūraḥ pavasva |
translation_english: Be victorious for us in contests, O hero, strong on your chariots.

sanskrit_text: युधा युध्यस्व सवसा सहस्वानिन्द्र शत्रून्।
transliteration: yudhā yudhyasva savasā sahasvān indra śatrūn |
translation_english: Fight with might, O powerful Indra, overpower the enemies.

sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रः पिता चासि सखा विश्वस्य कर्मणः।
transliteration: sa no mitraḥ pitā cāsi sakhā viśvasya karmaṇaḥ |
translation_english: You are our friend and father, our companion in all action.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रस्य नु वीर्याणि प्र वोचं यानि चकार प्रथमानी वज्री।
transliteration: indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī |
translation_english: Now I proclaim the heroic deeds of Indra, the thunder-wielder, the first exploits he performed.

sanskrit_text: अहन्नहिं मन्युमन्तं वज्रेण हन्ता पुरा अयोध्यः।
transliteration: ahann ahiṃ manyumantaṃ vajreṇa hantā purā ayodhyaḥ |
translation_english: He struck down the wrathful serpent with the thunderbolt, the unconquerable slayer of fortresses.

sanskrit_text: यो वृत्रं जघानावृतं अपां निन्ये अप्सु।
transliteration: yo vṛtraṃ jaghānāvṛtaṃ apāṃ ninye apsu |
translation_english: He who slew Vṛtra and released the waters that were held back.

sanskrit_text: स जनास इन्द्रः शूरो वज्रबाहुः सुदक्षः।
transliteration: sa janāsa indraḥ śūro vajrabāhuḥ sudakṣaḥ |
translation_english: That Indra is the hero for the people, strong-armed with the thunderbolt, perfectly skilled.

sanskrit_text: स नो वाजेषु वाजिनीवो रयिं दाशुषे दधातु।
transliteration: sa no vājeṣu vājinīvo rayiṃ dāśuṣe dadhātu |
translation_english: May he grant wealth to the worshipper, rich in prizes and victories.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नु देवासो ममृजुर्हविष्मन्तो अर्चत।
transliteration: indraṃ nu devāso mamṛjur haviṣmanto arcata |
translation_english: Now the gods themselves glorify Indra, praising him with offerings.

sanskrit_text: प्र ये शुम्भन्ते जनयो न सप्तयो यामन्रुद्रस्य सूनवः सुदंससः।
transliteration: pra ye śumbhante janayo na saptayo yāman rudrasya sūnavaḥ sudaṃsasaḥ |

sanskrit_text: ते, देवैः अभिषिक्ताः, महिमानम् अग्निं प्रति व्रजन्ते, धूपा उद्दिश्य देवानां वासो वृषव्राता युग्ध्वम्।
transliteration: te devaidh abhiṣiktāḥ mahimānam agnim prati vrajante, dhūpā uddiśya devānāṃ vāso vṛṣavrātā yugdhvam |

sanskrit_text: वि ये भ्राजन्ते सुमखाः ऋष्टिभिः प्रच्यावयन्तो अच्युता चिदोजसा।
transliteration: vi ye bhrājante sumakhāḥ ṛṣṭibhiḥ pracyāvayanto acyutā cid ojasā |

sanskrit_text: मनोजुवो यन्मरुतो रथे ष्वा वृषव्राताः पृषतीरयु॑ग्ध्वम्।
transliteration: manojuvo yan maruto rathe ṣvā vṛṣavrātāḥ pṛṣatīrayugdhvam |

sanskrit_text: प्र यद्रथेṣu पृषतीरयुग्ध्वं वाजे अद्रिं मरुतो रंहयन्तः।
transliteration: pra yad ratheṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam vāje adriṃ maruto raṃhayantaḥ |

sanskrit_text: शूरा इव युधय न जग्मयः श्रवस्यावो न पृतनासु येतिरे।
transliteration: śūrā iva yuyudhayo na jagmayāḥ śravasyavo na pṛtanāsu yetire |

sanskrit_text: भयन्ते विश्वा भुवना मरुद्भ्यः राजा न इव त्वेषसंदृशो नरः।
transliteration: bhayante viśvā bhuvanā marudbhyaḥ rājā na iva tveṣasandṛśo naraḥ |

sanskrit_text: आ वो वहन्तु सप्तयो रघुष्यदो रघुपत्नी प्र जिगात बाहुभिः।
transliteration: ā vo vahantu saptayo raghuṣyado raghupatnī pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ |

sanskrit_text: सीदता बर्हिरुरु वः सदस्कृतं मा॑दयध्वं मरुतो मध्वो अन्धसः।
transliteration: sīdatā barhir uru vaḥ sadas kṛtaṃ mādayadhvam maruto madhvo andhasaḥ |

sanskrit_text: आ वो मरुतो वहन्तु हवां वाय॑वः पृथिवीं चेद्या॑सो वः पस्तु ते।
transliteration: ā vo maruto vahantu havāṃ vāyavā pṛthivīṃ ced yāso vaḥ pastu te |
translation_english: O Maruts, may the winds carry your praise and may your fame be upon the earth and sky.

sanskrit_text: मरुतो यद्वो अप्सु यद्वो दिवि यद्वो अन्तरीक्षे।
transliteration: maruto yad vo apsu yad vo divi yad vo antarikṣe |
translation_english: O Maruts, whether you are in the waters, in heaven, or in the mid-space.

sanskrit_text: यद्वो गिरिषु प्रचरथ यद्वो रथेषु रंहथ।
transliteration: yad vo giriṣu pracaratha yad vo ratheṣu raṃhatha |
translation_english: Whether you roam upon the mountains or rush forward on your chariots.

sanskrit_text: तद्वो हुवेम विदथे यज्ञे अस्मिन्सधस्थे।
transliteration: tad vo huvem vidathe yajñe asmin sadhaste |
translation_english: In that condition we invoke you at this assembly, at this sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: आ नो मरुतो गन्तन स्वस्ति नो धत्तन।
transliteration: ā no maruto gantana svasti no dhattana |
translation_english: Come to us, O Maruts; bestow well-being upon us.

sanskrit_text: युष्माकं हि शर्धो न मर्यं न क्षीयते।
transliteration: yuṣmākaṃ hi śardho na maryaṃ na kṣīyate |
translation_english: Your host indeed never weakens nor diminishes.

sanskrit_text: न यं धृष्णोति कश्चन न वः शत्रुर्न रिष्यति।
transliteration: na yaṃ dhṛṣṇoti kaścana na vaḥ śatrur na riṣyati |
translation_english: No one can overpower you; no enemy can harm you.

sanskrit_text: उत स्म वः शर्धो दिव्यं उत पार्थिवम्।
transliteration: uta sma vaḥ śardho divyaṃ uta pārthivam |
translation_english: Your host is both heavenly and earthly.

sanskrit_text: विश्वं हि रोदसी महो मरुतो वि चर्षथ।
transliteration: viśvaṃ hi rodasī maho maruto vi carṣatha |
translation_english: You Maruts move through the vast heaven and earth.

sanskrit_text: तद्वो नः सुम्नमीमहे दीर्घमायुः कृणोतन।
transliteration: tad vo naḥ sumnam īmahe dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotana |
translation_english: For that favor we pray to you—grant us long life.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो मरुतो दधातन।
transliteration: svasti no maruto dadhātana |
translation_english: Bestow well-being upon us, O Maruts.

sanskrit_text: प्र ये महे मरुतः सुदानवो विश्वेभिरायुधैः सुदंससः।
transliteration: pra ye mahe marutaḥ sudānavo viśvebhir āyudhaiḥ sudaṃsasaḥ |
translation_english: Forth go the great Maruts, generous and splendid, well-armed with all weapons.

sanskrit_text: अच्युताचिदोजसा गिरयो वि चर्षथ।
transliteration: acyutā cid ojasā girayo vi carṣatha |
translation_english: With unfailing might you move even the mountains.

sanskrit_text: येषां नु स्रुतयो दिवि प्र रोचन्ते महो रजः।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ nu srutayo divi pra rocante maho rajaḥ |
translation_english: Whose courses in heaven shine forth across the vast sky.

sanskrit_text: न वः शर्धो न मर्यं न स्थिरं चिद्वि बाधते।
transliteration: na vaḥ śardho na maryaṃ na sthiraṃ cid vi bādhate |
translation_english: No mortal host, no steadfast power can oppose your band.

sanskrit_text: ते शर्धा मरुतो दिव्यं पार्थिवं च वि बिभ्रते।
transliteration: te śardhā maruto divyaṃ pārthivaṃ ca vi bibhrate |
translation_english: The Maruts bear both the heavenly and the earthly hosts.

sanskrit_text: प्र वो महे मरुतो वाचमर्कैः स्तुषे शर्धाय सुम्नम्।
transliteration: pra vo mahe maruto vācam arkaiḥ stuṣe śardhāya sumnam |
translation_english: I raise my great voice to you with hymns, praising your host for favor.

sanskrit_text: युष्माकं हि स्थिरं व्रतं न कश्चन वि जिगाति।
transliteration: yuṣmākaṃ hi sthiraṃ vrataṃ na kaścana vi jigāti |
translation_english: Your firm ordinance no one can overthrow.

sanskrit_text: वि यो रजांसि मरुतो वि रोदसी महि चक्रे।
transliteration: vi yo rajāṃsi maruto vi rodasī mahi cakre |
translation_english: You Maruts have spread out the realms, the great heaven and earth.

sanskrit_text: तद्वो नः सुम्नमीमहे मरुतो जरितॄणाम्।
transliteration: tad vo naḥ sumnam īmahe maruto jaritṝṇām |
translation_english: That favor of yours we seek, O Maruts, for the singers.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो मरुतो दधातन।
transliteration: svasti no maruto dadhātana |
translation_english: Bestow well-being upon us, O Maruts.

sanskrit_text: आ वो मरुतो दिव्यो वृषा यज्ञं गच्छन्तु रोदसी।
transliteration: ā vo maruto divyo vṛṣā yajñaṃ gacchantu rodasī |
translation_english: May the divine, mighty Maruts come to the sacrifice from heaven and earth.

sanskrit_text: येषां शर्धो न मर्यं न स्थिरं चन बाधते।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ śardho na maryaṃ na sthiraṃ cana bādhate |
translation_english: Whose host no mortal and no firm power can obstruct.

sanskrit_text: वि ये रजांसि मरुतो वि रोदसी महि चक्रे।
transliteration: vi ye rajāṃsi maruto vi rodasī mahi cakre |
translation_english: You Maruts have spread out the regions, the great heaven and earth.

sanskrit_text: ते हि वृषा मरुतः सुदानवः शूरा ऋष्वा अजनयन्।
transliteration: te hi vṛṣā marutaḥ sudānavāḥ śūrā ṛṣvā ajanayan |
translation_english: For those Maruts are mighty, generous, heroic, producing lofty strength.

sanskrit_text: युष्माकं हि स्थिरं व्रतं न कश्चन वि जिगाति।
transliteration: yuṣmākaṃ hi sthiraṃ vrataṃ na kaścana vi jigāti |
translation_english: Your firm ordinance no one can overthrow.

sanskrit_text: प्र वो महे मरुतो वाचमर्कैः स्तुषे शर्धाय सुम्नम्।
transliteration: pra vo mahe maruto vācam arkaiḥ stuṣe śardhāya sumnam |
translation_english: I raise my great voice in hymns, praising your host for favor.

sanskrit_text: येषां नु स्रुतयो दिवि प्र रोचन्ते महो रजः।
transliteration: yeṣāṃ nu srutayo divi pra rocante maho rajaḥ |
translation_english: Whose paths in heaven shine forth across the vast expanse.

sanskrit_text: ते नो मरुतो दिव्यं पार्थिवं च सुम्नम्।
transliteration: te no maruto divyaṃ pārthivaṃ ca sumnam |
translation_english: Grant us, O Maruts, heavenly and earthly favor.

sanskrit_text: तद्वो नः सुम्नमीमहे मरुतो जरितॄणाम्।
transliteration: tad vo naḥ sumnam īmahe maruto jaritṝṇām |
translation_english: That favor of yours we seek, O Maruts, for the singers.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो मरुतो दधातन।
transliteration: svasti no maruto dadhātana |
translation_english: Bestow well-being upon us, O Maruts.

sanskrit_text: आ नो भद्राः क्रतवो यन्तु विश्वतः।
transliteration: ā no bhadrāḥ kratavo yantu viśvataḥ |
translation_english: May noble thoughts come to us from every side.

sanskrit_text: अदब्धासो अपरीतास उद्भिदः।
transliteration: adabdhāso aparītāsa udbhidaḥ |
translation_english: Unhindered, undefeated, and unbroken.

sanskrit_text: देवा नो यथा सदमिद्वृधे असन्नप्रायुवो रक्षिता दिवे-दिवे।
transliteration: devā no yathā sadam id vṛdhe asann aprāyuvo rakṣitā dive-dive |
translation_english: May the gods always be with us for our growth, unwearied, guarding us day by day.

sanskrit_text: शिवा नः सन्तु दिशः प्रदिशश्च।
transliteration: śivā naḥ santu diśaḥ pradiśaś ca |
translation_english: May the directions and intermediate directions be auspicious to us.

sanskrit_text: आदित्या नो अधिते भवन्तु।
transliteration: ādityā no adhite bhavantu |
translation_english: May the Ādityas be gracious to us.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो मित्रावरुणा स्वस्ति नो भवत्वर्यमा। स्वस्ति न इन्द्रो बृहस्पतिः स्वस्ति नो विष्णुरुरुक्रमः॥
transliteration: svasti no mitrāvaruṇā svasti no bhavaty aryamā | svasti na indro bṛhaspatiḥ svasti no viṣṇur urukramaḥ ||
translation_english: May Mitra and Varuṇa grant us well-being; may Aryaman grant us well-being. May Indra and Bṛhaspati grant us well-being; may wide-striding Viṣṇu grant us well-being.

sanskrit_text: आ नो देवाः सविता प्रजावत् सुमतिं विश्ववारेण्याम्।
transliteration: ā no devāḥ savitā prajāvāt sumatiṃ viśvavāreṇyām |
translation_english: May the gods, led by Savitṛ, grant us noble thought, rich in all that is worthy.

sanskrit_text: परि नो देवाः सविता सुवृक्तिं परि विश्वानि दुरिता तरन्तु।
transliteration: pari no devāḥ savitā suvṛktiṃ pari viśvāni duritā tarantu |
translation_english: May the gods, with Savitṛ, carry us beyond all troubles, through perfect prayer.

sanskrit_text: विश्वे देवाः सवितुः प्रसूताः सुवृक्तिभिः प्र णयन्तु यज्ञम्।
transliteration: viśve devāḥ savituḥ prasūtāḥ suvṛktibhiḥ pra nayantu yajñam |
translation_english: May all the gods, impelled by Savitṛ, guide the sacrifice forward by good hymns.

sanskrit_text: स नो देवाः सविता सवेम स्यात् पथ्या अस्मभ्यं सुप्रणीतिः।
transliteration: sa no devāḥ savitā savema syāt pathyā asmabhyaṃ supranītiḥ |
translation_english: May Savitṛ and the gods grant us right guidance and a smooth path.

sanskrit_text: शं नो मित्रः शं वरुणः शं नो भवत्वर्यमा।
transliteration: śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavaty aryamā |
translation_english: May Mitra bring us peace, may Varuṇa bring us peace, may Aryaman bring us peace.

sanskrit_text: शं न इन्द्रो बृहस्पतिः शं नो विष्णुरुरुक्रमः॥
transliteration: śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no viṣṇur urukramaḥ ||
translation_english: May Indra and Bṛhaspati bring us peace; may wide-striding Viṣṇu bring us peace.

sanskrit_text: सोमं पवस्व धारया मधोरभि।
transliteration: somaṃ pavasva dhārayā madhor abhi |
translation_english: Flow forth, O Soma, in a stream of sweetness.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राय सोमं सुते मधु पिब।
transliteration: indrāya somaṃ sute madhu piba |
translation_english: Drink the sweet Soma, pressed for Indra.

sanskrit_text: सोमः पवित्रे अधि रोचते शुभः।
transliteration: somaḥ pavitre adhi rocate śubhaḥ |
translation_english: Pure Soma shines brightly upon the filter.

sanskrit_text: सोमः पवमानो जनयत् स्वस्ति।
transliteration: somaḥ pavamāno janayat svasti |
translation_english: Purifying Soma brings forth well-being.

sanskrit_text: सोमं देवाः पिबन्ति विश्वदेवाः।
transliteration: somaṃ devāḥ pibanti viśvadevāḥ |
translation_english: All the gods drink the Soma.

sanskrit_text: इयं वां ब्रह्मणस्पते उषा देवेषु रोचते।
transliteration: iyaṃ vāṃ brahmaṇaspate uṣā deveṣu rocate |
translation_english: This Dawn shines forth among the gods, O Lord of prayer.

sanskrit_text: उषा उच्छा दिवो दुहिता ज्योतिषा बृहता बभूव।
transliteration: uṣā ucchā divo duhitā jyotiṣā bṛhatā babhūva |
translation_english: Dawn has risen, the daughter of heaven, great in her radiance.

sanskrit_text: उषा अपो जरणयत्सूर्यस्येव रश्मयः।
transliteration: uṣā apo jaraṇayat sūryasyeva raśmayaḥ |
translation_english: Dawn sets the waters in motion, like the rays of the Sun.

sanskrit_text: उषा जीवमुदीरयति मृतं जीवयति पुनः।
transliteration: uṣā jīvam udīrayati mṛtaṃ jīvayati punaḥ |
translation_english: Dawn awakens the living and restores life again.

sanskrit_text: उषा नारीव शुचिः संधत्ते वसूनि।
transliteration: uṣā nārīva śuciḥ saṃdhatte vasūni |
translation_english: Pure Dawn, like a woman, arranges her treasures.

sanskrit_text: उषा अश्वान्नयति गावो विश्वा अनु क्रतुं।
transliteration: uṣā aśvān nayati gāvo viśvā anu kratum |
translation_english: Dawn leads forth horses and all cattle according to order.

sanskrit_text: उषा विश्वस्य जगतो देवी नेत्री बभूव।
transliteration: uṣā viśvasya jagato devī netrī babhūva |
translation_english: Dawn has become the divine guide of the whole world.

sanskrit_text: उषा पप्रथिता भुवनानि द्यावापृथिवी अपः।
transliteration: uṣā paprathitā bhuvanāni dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ |
translation_english: Dawn has spread out the worlds—heaven, earth, and the waters.

sanskrit_text: उषा नः शश्वदिष्टये वर्धयन्ती रयिं गच्छतु।
transliteration: uṣā naḥ śaśvad iṣṭaye vardhayantī rayiṃ gacchatu |
translation_english: May Dawn ever come to us, increasing wealth for our desire.

sanskrit_text: उषा नः पन्थामनु दर्शयन्ती शुभं यच्छतु।
transliteration: uṣā naḥ panthām anu darśayantī śubhaṃ yacchatu |
translation_english: May Dawn show us the path and grant us auspiciousness.

sanskrit_text: उषा देवानामध्वरं रक्षति सदा।
transliteration: uṣā devānām adhvaraṃ rakṣati sadā |
translation_english: Dawn always guards the sacrifice of the gods.

sanskrit_text: उषा मनुष्येभ्यः कर्माणि प्रेरयति।
transliteration: uṣā manuṣyebhyaḥ karmāṇi prerayati |
translation_english: Dawn urges human beings to their works.

sanskrit_text: उषा विश्वान्याघ्नती तमांसि।
transliteration: uṣā viśvāny āghnatī tamāṃsi |
translation_english: Dawn strikes down all darkness.

sanskrit_text: उषा ज्योतिषा रोचमाना महो दिवः।
transliteration: uṣā jyotiṣā rocamānā maho divaḥ |
translation_english: Dawn shines with light from the great heaven.

sanskrit_text: उषा नो गोमतीरिष्टे धत्तां दीर्घमायुः।
transliteration: uṣā no gomatīr iṣṭe dhattāṃ dīrgham āyuḥ |
translation_english: Beloved Dawn, grant us cattle, prosperity, and long life.

sanskrit_text: अग्नीषोमाविमं सु मे शृणुतं हवमुत्तमम्।
transliteration: agnīṣomāv imaṃ su me śṛṇutaṃ havam uttamam |
translation_english: O Agni and Soma, hear well this excellent invocation of mine.

sanskrit_text: अग्नीषोमा यो अद्य वामिदं हविर्निवेदयामहे।
transliteration: agnīṣomā yo adya vām idaṃ havir nivedayāmahe |
translation_english: O Agni and Soma, today we present this oblation to you both.

sanskrit_text: अग्नीषोमा विश्वतः पाहि नः परि पान्त्वस्मान्दुरितादवद्यात्।
transliteration: agnīṣomā viśvataḥ pāhi naḥ pari pāntv asmān duritād avadyāt |
translation_english: O Agni and Soma, protect us on every side; guard us from misfortune and guilt.

sanskrit_text: अग्नीषोमा नः पितरौ युवं हि नः सूनवेव सूपायनौ।
transliteration: agnīṣomā naḥ pitarau yuvaṃ hi naḥ sūnaveva sūpāyanau |
translation_english: Agni and Soma, you are our parents, kindly to us as a father to his son.

sanskrit_text: अग्नीषोमा सुमतिं मे धत्तं रयिं च नः पुष्यतम्।
transliteration: agnīṣomā sumatiṃ me dhattaṃ rayiṃ ca naḥ puṣyatam |
translation_english: Agni and Soma, grant me good thought and cause our wealth to flourish.

sanskrit_text: अग्नीषोमौ स्वस्ति नो धत्तं दीर्घमायुः कृणुतम्।
transliteration: agnīṣomau svasti no dhattaṃ dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇutam |
translation_english: Agni and Soma, bestow well-being upon us and grant us long life.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं होतारं प्रथमान्तमर्हं संस्तुतं विश्वरूपं बृहन्तम्।
transliteration: agniṃ hotāraṃ prathamāntam arhaṃ saṃstutaṃ viśvarūpaṃ bṛhantam |
translation_english: Agni, the invoker, foremost and worthy, praised, of all forms and vast.

sanskrit_text: तमिद्धि पूर्वे ऋषयो विध्यन्तो धीतिभिः कवयो यज्ञियासः।
transliteration: tam id dhi pūrve ṛṣayo vidhyanto dhītibhiḥ kavayo yajñiyāsaḥ |
translation_english: Him indeed the ancient seers, inspired and wise, established for sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: स देवेषु मानुषेषु च पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः।
transliteration: sa deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca purohito viśvavedāḥ |
translation_english: He is the priest among gods and among humans, the knower of all.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्दूतः कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः।
transliteration: agnir dūtaḥ kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
translation_english: Agni is the messenger, wise in will, truthful, of radiant fame.

sanskrit_text: स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु विश्वतः परिभूरसि।
transliteration: sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May he rightly guide our sacrifice, encompassing it on every side.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु दीर्घमायुः कृणोतु नः।
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu naḥ |
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being and make our life long.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं वो वृत्रहन्तमं हवामहे पुरुप्रियम्।
transliteration: agniṃ vo vṛtrahantamaṃ havāmahe purupriyam |
translation_english: We invoke Agni, most slayer of obstacles, dear to many.

sanskrit_text: स नो देवेषु मानुषेषु च पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः।
transliteration: sa no deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca purohito viśvavedāḥ |
translation_english: He is our priest among gods and among humans, the knower of all.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्दूतः कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः।
transliteration: agnir dūtaḥ kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
translation_english: Agni is the messenger, wise in resolve, truthful, of radiant fame.

sanskrit_text: तमिद्धि पूर्वे ऋषयो विध्यन्तो धीतिभिः।
transliteration: tam id dhi pūrve ṛṣayo vidhyanto dhītibhiḥ |
translation_english: Him indeed the ancient seers established with inspired thought.

sanskrit_text: स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु विश्वतः परिभूरसि।
transliteration: sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May he rightly guide our sacrifice, encompassing it on every side.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु दीर्घमायुः कृणोतु नः।
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu naḥ |
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being and make our life long.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं नरो दीधितिभिर्गिरोभिः समिद्धमाहुः स हविर्दधाति।
transliteration: agniṃ naro dīdhitibhir girobhir samiddham āhuḥ sa havir dadhāti |
translation_english: Men kindle Agni with shining thoughts and hymns; he places the oblation.

sanskrit_text: स नो देवाँ अवसे वहाति जातवेदाः पुरोहितः।
transliteration: sa no devān avase vahāti jātavedāḥ purohitaḥ |
translation_english: Jātavedas, the household priest, brings the gods to us for our aid.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्दूतः कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः।
transliteration: agnir dūtaḥ kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
translation_english: Agni is the messenger, wise in will, truthful, of radiant fame.

sanskrit_text: स देवेषु मानुषेषु च पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः।
transliteration: sa deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca purohito viśvavedāḥ |
translation_english: He is priest among gods and among humans, the knower of all.

sanskrit_text: स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु विश्वतः परिभूरसि।
transliteration: sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May he rightly guide our sacrifice, encompassing it on every side.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु दीर्घमायुः कृणोतु नः।
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu naḥ |
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being and make our life long.

sanskrit_text: अग्निं नरो दीधितिभिर्गिरोभिः समिद्धमाहुः स हविर्दधाति।
transliteration: agniṃ naro dīdhitibhir girobhir samiddham āhuḥ sa havir dadhāti |
translation_english: Men kindle Agni with shining thoughts and hymns; he places the oblation.

sanskrit_text: स नो देवाँ अवसे वहाति जातवेदाः पुरोहितः।
transliteration: sa no devān avase vahāti jātavedāḥ purohitaḥ |
translation_english: Jātavedas, the household priest, brings the gods to us for our aid.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्दूतः कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः।
transliteration: agnir dūtaḥ kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
translation_english: Agni is the messenger, wise in resolve, truthful, of radiant fame.

sanskrit_text: स देवेषु मानुषेषु च पुरोहितो विश्ववेदाः।
transliteration: sa deveṣu mānuṣeṣu ca purohito viśvavedāḥ |
translation_english: He is priest among gods and among humans, the knower of all.

sanskrit_text: स नो यज्ञं समन्वतु विश्वतः परिभूरसि।
transliteration: sa no yajñaṃ samanvatu viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
translation_english: May he rightly guide our sacrifice, encompassing it on every side.

sanskrit_text: स्वस्ति नो अग्निर्दधातु दीर्घमायुः कृणोतु नः।
transliteration: svasti no agnir dadhātu dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu naḥ |
translation_english: May Agni grant us well-being and make our life long.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी आ गच्छतं नो यज्ञं वर्धयन्ता हविषा।
transliteration: indrāgnī ā gacchatam no yajñaṃ vardhayantā haviṣā |
translation_english: O Indra and Agni, come to our sacrifice, strengthening it with the oblation.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी शृणुतं हवं नो अस्मानवदं कृतम्।
transliteration: indrāgnī śṛṇutaṃ havaṃ no asmān avadaṃ kṛtam |
translation_english: O Indra and Agni, hear our call, made for our protection.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी युवं हि नः पितरौ युवं सखायौ।
transliteration: indrāgnī yuvam hi naḥ pitarau yuvam sakhāyau |
translation_english: Indra and Agni, you are truly our parents and our friends.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी नो रयिं दत्तं वीरं पुष्यतम्।
transliteration: indrāgnī no rayiṃ dattaṃ vīraṃ puṣyatam |
translation_english: Indra and Agni, grant us wealth and nourish heroic strength.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी रक्षतं नः परि विश्वतः।
transliteration: indrāgnī rakṣataṃ naḥ pari viśvataḥ |
translation_english: Indra and Agni, protect us completely on every side.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी स्वस्ति नो दत्तं दीर्घमायुः कृणुतम्।
transliteration: indrāgnī svasti no dattaṃ dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇutam |
translation_english: Indra and Agni, grant us well-being and make our life long.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी यं वां हवामहे तं शृणुतं हवम्।
transliteration: indrāgnī yaṃ vāṃ havāmahe taṃ śṛṇutaṃ havam |
translation_english: O Indra and Agni, hear this invocation which we address to you.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी युवं नः सखायौ युवं नः पितरौ।
transliteration: indrāgnī yuvam naḥ sakhāyau yuvam naḥ pitarau |
translation_english: Indra and Agni, you are our friends; you are our parents.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी नो दुरितानि विश्वा नाशयतम्।
transliteration: indrāgnī no duritāni viśvā nāśayatam |
translation_english: Indra and Agni, remove from us all misfortunes.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी रयिमस्मभ्यं वीरवत्तमं दत्तम्।
transliteration: indrāgnī rayim asmabhyaṃ vīravattamaṃ dattam |
translation_english: Indra and Agni, grant us wealth rich in heroic strength.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी रक्षतं नो विश्वतः परि।
transliteration: indrāgnī rakṣataṃ no viśvataḥ pari |
translation_english: Indra and Agni, protect us completely on every side.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्राग्नी स्वस्ति नो दत्तं दीर्घमायुः कृणुतम्।
transliteration: indrāgnī svasti no dattaṃ dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇutam |
translation_english: Indra and Agni, grant us well-being and make our life long.

sanskrit_text: स घा नो योग आ भुवदिन्द्रो वज्री हिरण्ययः।
transliteration: sa ghā no yoga ā bhuvad indro vajrī hiraṇyayaḥ |
translation_english: May Indra, wielder of the thunderbolt, radiant with gold, come to our aid.

sanskrit_text: स नो वृषा जनानां विश्वेषां दुरिता नशत्।
transliteration: sa no vṛṣā janānāṃ viśveṣāṃ duritā naśat |
translation_english: May that mighty one drive away all misfortunes of all people.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नु देवासो ममृजुर्हविष्मन्तो अर्चत।
transliteration: indraṃ nu devāso mamṛjur haviṣmanto arcata |
translation_english: Now the gods themselves purify Indra and praise him with offerings.

sanskrit_text: यस्य ते महिना महि वृषभस्येव ते रथः।
transliteration: yasya te mahinā mahi vṛṣabhasyeva te rathaḥ |
translation_english: By whose greatness your might is vast, like the chariot of a powerful bull.

sanskrit_text: त्वं नः सखा शिवो भव सूनवे पितेव नो भव।
transliteration: tvaṃ naḥ sakhā śivo bhava sūnave piteva no bhava |
translation_english: Be our friendly companion, gracious like a father to his son.

sanskrit_text: स नो वाजेषु वाजिनीवो रयिं दाशुषे दधातु।
transliteration: sa no vājeṣu vājinīvo rayiṃ dāśuṣe dadhātu |
translation_english: May he grant wealth to the worshipper, rich in prizes and victories.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नु स्तुषे महिना यज्ञानां पते।
transliteration: indraṃ nu stuṣe mahinā yajñānāṃ pate |
translation_english: Now I praise Indra in his greatness, the lord of sacrifices.
